concept.title: Labeling system
concept.shortdesc: The labeling system is used to organize the cards on a board.

conbody.p:
There are several color options included in the labeling system. These include:
green
yellow
orange
red
purple
blue
aqua
seafoam green
pink
navy blue
no color These may be used in a variety of organizational methods. A label may also have a title that can be displayed, but a nameless label is acceptable.
